thread.title: GARRY
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by GARRY

author: GARRY
title: GARRY
text: Arrived in Mackay on the 9th March picked up Kia Rio which was available on arrival. After one day had a problem with the auto lock on the drivers side door. Rang Kerwin at Redspot in Mackay who told me to bring it back to the airport (only a short drive for me) and would swap vehicles. Arrived and was upgraded to a Toyota Altice. Kerwin was a very decent young man who could not been more helpful. Very impressed with the service. Returned vehicle to the airport on the 16th March to very nice young woman. Will hire again from Redspot. Keep up the good work Kerwin.
